attachments.title: Adidas: Adidas to use marine plastic waste in products from 2016
attachments.text: BERLIN, April 20 (Reuters) - German sportswear firm Adidas is teaming up with a group trying to clean up the world's oceans with a plan to develop materials made from marine plastic waste that can be used in its products.
